name: Color Mode Identifier (Ingress)
title: CMI-I
definition: Identifies when the provider configuration will use the specific customer Class of Service (CoS) markings when applying the Bandwidth Profile CIR/EIR.
validEntryNotes: When this field is blank and the ACT field on the ASR Form is “N”, color-blind will be utilized.
When this field is blank and the ACT field on the ASR Form is “C”, the existing value will be retained.
usageNotes: Optional when the ACT field on the ASR Form is “N” or “C”, the associated LREF field is populated and the LOSACT field is not “D”, otherwise prohibited.
fieldNotes: MEF color-aware mode indicates the provider is using customer CIR/EIR markings.
MEF color-blind mode indicates the provider ignores customer CIR/EIR markings.
